content: Just checking in if y'all are thinking there might be some regressions in 1.45.0 that you'll want to include in a point release. We're currently planning one for Tuesday next week; if you do come up with something please post in https://rust-lang.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/241545-t-release/topic/1.2E45.2E1.20release
@Luca Barbato that seems like a change only visible to people depending on the crates.io release, right? IMO seems fine to backport
it seems to apply cleanly on top of the release tag
